Package ch.ethz.inspire.emod.model.thermal

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AThermalIntegrator
    Implements an integration step to numerically solve a ODE of the form dm/dt = mDotIn + mDotOut dTi/dt = Ai*Ti+Bi where - T = [T1 T2 ...
    ForcedHeatTransfere
    General forced heat transfere class Assumptions: Total heat transfere takes place with internal energy of a moved fluid.
    FreeHeatTransfere
    General free heat transfere class Calculates the heat flow trough a wall with different layers and convection on both sides.
    HomogStorage
    General homogenous thermal storage class Assumptions: Homegenous temperature distribuntion.
    LayerStorage
    General layer thermal storage class Assumptions: Specific heat constant does not depend on temperature.
    ThermalArray
    General thermal array class
    ThermalElement
    General thermal element class
